special_text:
Equipped creatures you control have double strike.
[+1]: Create a Sword token. You may attach it to a creature you control. [i](It’s an Equipment artifact with equip {2} and “Equipped creature gets +1/+1.”)[/i]
[-3]: Nahiri, Zendikar’s Protector deals 3 damage to each creature that isn’t equipped.
[-7]: For each Equipment you control, create a token that’s a copy of it.
